name: ES-5 Encoder
description: This algorithm allows you to drive the outputs of an attached ES-5 expansion module, or of an ESX8GT expander attached to the ES-5.
use_cases: Controlling ESX8GT expander outputs via ES-5

parameters.name: Expander
parameters.description: Chooses the expander module â€“ 1 for the ES-5 itself, or 2-6 for the attached ESX8GTs.

input_ports.name: Input
input_ports.description: Chooses the input bus to convert.

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: Chooses the output on the selected expander.
